prompt:
Build a complete Vue 3 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS roadmap application in /Users/tachongrak/Projects/sp-planning/apps/roadmap-v2.

The types and Pinia store are already created. Now build all the Vue components and functionality:

## Components to Create:

1. **App.vue** - Main app component with header and layout
2. **ControlPanel.vue** - Top control panel with buttons:
   - Save/Load buttons (use localStorage)
   - New Category button (opens modal)
   - New Sprint button (opens modal)
   - New Checkpoint button
   - Undo button

3. **RoadmapGrid.vue** - Main grid component:
   - CSS Grid layout: sticky category column + sprint columns
   - Proper alignment for categories and sprints
   - Scrollable horizontally
   - Renders CategoryRow for each category

4. **CategoryRow.vue** - Single category row:
   - Category label (icon + name, editable on double-click)
   - SprintCell for each sprint
   - Delete button for custom categories

5. **SprintCell.vue** - Draggable drop zone:
   - Accepts feature drops from any category/sprint
   - Shows '+ New Feature' button
   - Renders FeatureCard components
   - HTML5 drag & drop API (dragover, drop events)

6. **FeatureCard.vue** - Draggable feature card:
   - Draggable with HTML5 API
   - Shows title, description
   - Edit on double-click (opens modal)
   - Delete button
   - Color-coded by category

7. **CategoryModal.vue** - Create/edit category:
   - Name input
   - Icon/emoji input
   - Color picker (grid of 9 predefined colors)
   - Save/Cancel buttons

8. **SprintModal.vue** - Create/edit sprint:
   - Sprint number input
   - Name input
   - Save/Cancel buttons

9. **FeatureModal.vue** - Create/edit feature:
   - Title input
   - Description textarea
   - Category selector
   - Sprint selector
   - Save/Cancel buttons

10. **ToastContainer.vue** - Toast notifications:
    - Displays toasts from Pinia store
    - Auto-dismiss after duration
    - Different styles for success/error/info/warning

## Key Requirements:

- **Drag & Drop**: Features can be dragged across ANY category/sprint (no restrictions)
- **Category Updates**: When dropped in new category, update feature's category_id and show toast
- **Tailwind Styling**: Use the colors defined in tailwind.config.js for each category
- **localStorage**: Persist state (categories, sprints, features) to localStorage
- **Responsive**: Grid should handle many sprints (horizontal scroll)
- **Double-click to edit**: Categories, sprints, and features
- **Toast feedback**: Show success/error toasts for all operations
- **Type safety**: Use the types from src/types/index.ts

## Grid Layout:
- First column: Category labels (sticky, 180px wide)
- Remaining columns: Sprint cells (min 200px each)
- All cells in same row must align perfectly (same height)
- Use CSS Grid with proper grid-template-columns

## State Management:
- All state in Pinia store (src/stores/roadmap.ts)
- Store already has all methods - just call them from components
- localStorage sync in store methods
